DOC.brief_summary: The objective study test experimental reproducibility within-subject variability qEEG ( quantitative electroencephalogram ) use two probe compound : MK3134 lorazepam . This study test hypothesis EEG ( Electroencephalogram ) theta power , average across topographical region interest decrease 6 hour administration MK3134 compare placebo . The objective study test experimental reproducibility within-subject variability qEEG use two probe compound : MK3134 lorazepam .
DOC.brief_title: EEG ( Electroencephalogram ) Platform Standardization Healthy Male Subjects ( 3134-010 )
DOC.criteria: Subject male 18 40 year age The subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) great equal 31 kg/m^2 prestudy ( screen ) visit Subject normal correct normal visual auditory acuity Subject nonsmoker and/or use nicotine nicotinecontaining product least approximately 6 month Subject righthanded Subject permanent cosmetic metallic object body interfere measurement Subject history stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disorder Subject history neoplastic disease Subject current diagnosis prior history sleep apnea Subject history fainting blood draw Subject history significant head injury/trauma Subject current diagnosis history Bipolar illness , Schizophrenia , Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) , claustrophobia Subject work night shift able avoid night shift work within 3 day treatment visit Subject currently regular user illicit drug significant history drug ( include alcohol ) abuse
